title: Types of Networks (LAN, MAN, WAN)
subject: Computer Networks
theory:
Classified by size:
1. **LAN (Local Area)**: Room/Building. High speed, privately owned (WiFi).
2. **MAN (Metropolitan Area)**: City (Cable TV). Public/Private.
3. **WAN (Wide Area)**: Country/Continent (Internet). Slow, Leased lines.

examples.code:
LAN: Office Network
WAN: The Internet

interview_questions.question: Difference between LAN and WAN?
interview_questions.answer: LAN: High speed, low error, short distance. WAN: Lower speed, higher error, long distance.
